# A000055 - OEIS

[![A000055 - OEIS](https://oeis.org/banner2021.jpg)](https://oeis.org/)

1, 1, 1, 1, 2, 3, 6, 11, 23, 47, 106, 235, 551, 1301, 3159, 7741, 19320, 48629, 123867, 317955, 823065, 2144505, 5623756, 14828074, 39299897, 104636890, 279793450, 751065460, 2023443032, 5469566585, 14830871802, 40330829030, 109972410221, 300628862480, 823779631721, 2262366343746, 6226306037178

OFFSET

0,5

COMMENTS

Also, number of unlabeled 2-gonal 2-trees with n-1 2-gons, for n>0. \[Corrected by [Andrei Zabolotskii](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Andrei_Zabolotskii), Jul 29 2025\]

Main diagonal of [A054924](https://oeis.org/A054924 "Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) = number of nonisomorphic unlabeled connected graphs with n nodes and k edges (n >= 1, 0 <= k ...").

Left border of [A157905](https://oeis.org/A157905 "Triangle read by rows, T(n,k) = A000055(n-k) * (A157904 * 0^(n-k))."). - [Gary W. Adamson](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Gary_W._Adamson), Mar 08 2009

From [Robert Munafo](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Robert_Munafo), Jan 24 2010: (Start)

Also counts classifications of n items that require exactly n-1 binary partitions; see Munafo link at [A005646](https://oeis.org/A005646 "Number of classifications of n elements."), also [A171871](https://oeis.org/A171871 "Triangle read by rows: Distinct classifications of N elements containing exactly R binary partitions.") and [A171872](https://oeis.org/A171872 "Triangle read by columns: Distinct classifications of N elements containing exactly R binary partitions.").

The 11 trees for n = 7 are illustrated at the Munafo web link.

Link to [A171871](https://oeis.org/A171871 "Triangle read by rows: Distinct classifications of N elements containing exactly R binary partitions.") / [A171872](https://oeis.org/A171872 "Triangle read by columns: Distinct classifications of N elements containing exactly R binary partitions.") conjectured by [Robert Munafo](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Robert_Munafo), then proved by [Andrew Weimholt](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Andrew_Weimholt) and [Franklin T. Adams-Watters](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Franklin_T._Adams-Watters) on Dec 29 2009. (End)

This is also "Number of tree perfect graphs on n nodes" \[see Hougardy\]. - [N. J. A. Sloane](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:N._J._A._Sloane), Dec 04 2015

For n > 0, a(n) is the number of ways to arrange n-1 unlabeled non-intersecting circles on a sphere. - [Vladimir Reshetnikov](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Vladimir_Reshetnikov), Aug 25 2016

All trees for n=1 through n=12 are depicted in Chapter 1 of the Steinbach reference. On p. 6 appear encircled two trees (with n=10) which seem inequivalent only when considered as ordered (planar) trees. Earlier instances of such possibly (in)equivalent trees could appear from n=6 on (and from n=9 on without equivalence modulo plane symmetry) but are not drawn separately there. - [M. F. Hasler](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:M._F._Hasler), Aug 29 2017

FORMULA

G.f.: A(x) = 1 + T(x) - T^2(x)/2 + T(x^2)/2, where T(x) = x + x^2 + 2\*x^3 +... is the g.f. for [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).").

a(n) ~ [A086308](https://oeis.org/A086308 "Decimal expansion of Otter's asymptotic constant beta for the number of unrooted trees.") \* [A051491](https://oeis.org/A051491 "Decimal expansion of Otter's rooted tree constant: lim_{n->inf} A000081(n+1)/A000081(n).") ^n \* n^(-5/2). - [Vaclav Kotesovec](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Vaclav_Kotesovec), Jan 04 2013

a(n) = [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n) - [A217420](https://oeis.org/A217420 "Number of rooted unlabeled trees where the root node has degree 2 and both branches are distinct.") (n+1), n > 0. - [R. J. Mathar](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:R._J._Mathar), Sep 19 2016

a(n) = [A000676](https://oeis.org/A000676 "Number of centered trees with n nodes.") (n) + [A000677](https://oeis.org/A000677 "Number of bicentered trees with n nodes.") (n). - [R. J. Mathar](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:R._J._Mathar), Aug 13 2018

a(n) = [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n) - (Sum\_{1<=i<=j, i+j=n} [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (i)\* [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (j)) + (1-(-1)^(n-1)) \* binomial([A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n/2)+1,2) / 2 \[Li, equation 4.2\]. - [Walt Rorie-Baety](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Walt_Rorie-Baety), Jul 05 2021

EXAMPLE

a(1) = 1 \[o\]; a(2) = 1 \[o-o\]; a(3) = 1 \[o-o-o\];

a(4) = 2 \[o-o-o and o-o-o-o\]

|

o

G.f. = 1 + x + x^2 + x^3 + 2\*x^4 + 3\*x^5 + 6\*x^6 + 11\*x^7 + 23\*x^8 +...

MAPLE

G000055:= series(1+G000081-G000081^2/2+subs(x=x^2, G000081)/2, x, 31); [A000055](https://oeis.org/A000055 "Number of trees with n unlabeled nodes."):= n->coeff(G000055, x, n); # where G000081 is g.f. for [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") starting with n=1 term

with(numtheory): b:= proc(n) option remember; \`if\`(n<=1, n, (add(add(d\*b(d), d=divisors(j)) \*b(n-j), j=1..n-1))/ (n-1)) end: a:= n-> \`if\`(n=0, 1, b(n) -(add(b(k) \*b(n-k), k=0..n) -\`if\`(irem(n, 2)=0, b(n/2), 0))/2):

seq(a(n), n=0..50);

\# [Alois P. Heinz](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Alois_P._Heinz), Aug 21 2008

\# Program to create b-file b000055.txt:

[A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point)."):= proc(n) option remember; local d, j;

if n <= 1 then n else

add(add(d\*procname(d), d=numtheory\[divisors\](j))\*procname(n-j), j=1..n-1)/(n-1);

fi end:

[A000055](https://oeis.org/A000055 "Number of trees with n unlabeled nodes."):= proc(nmax) local a81, n, t, a, j, i;

a81:= \[seq([A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (i), i=0..nmax)\]; a:= \[\];

for n from 0 to nmax do

if n = 0 then

t:= 1+op(n+1, a81);

else

t:= op(n+1, a81);

fi;

if type(n, even) then

t:= t-op(1+n/2, a81)^2/2;

t:= t+op(1+n/2, a81)/2;

fi;

for j from 0 to (n-1)/2 do

t:= t-op(j+1, a81)\*op(n-j+1, a81);

od:

a:= \[op(a), t\];

od:

a end:

L:= [A000055](https://oeis.org/A000055 "Number of trees with n unlabeled nodes.") (1000);

\# [R. J. Mathar](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:R._J._Mathar), Mar 06 2009

MATHEMATICA

s\[n\_, k\_\]:= s\[n, k\] = a\[n + 1 - k\] + If\[n < 2k, 0, s\[n - k, k\]\]; a\[1\] = 1; a\[n\_\]:= a\[n\] = Sum\[a\[i\] s\[n-1, i\] i, {i, 1, n-1}\] / (n-1); Table\[a\[i\] - Sum\[a\[j\] a\[i-j\], {j, 1, i/2}\] + If\[OddQ\[i\], 0, a\[i/2\] (a\[i/2\] + 1)/2\], {i, 1, 50}\] (\* [Robert A. Russell](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Robert_A._Russell) \*)

b\[0\] = 0; b\[1\] = 1; b\[n\_\]:= b\[n\] = Sum\[d\*b\[d\]\*b\[n-j\], {j, 1, n-1}, {d, Divisors\[j\]}\]/(n-1); a\[0\] = 1; a\[n\_\]:= b\[n\] - (Sum\[b\[k\]\*b\[n-k\], {k, 0, n}\] - If\[Mod\[n, 2\] == 0, b\[n/2\], 0\])/2; Table\[a\[n\], {n, 0, 50}\] (\* [Jean-François Alcover](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Jean-Fran%C3%A7ois_Alcover), Apr 09 2014, after [Alois P. Heinz](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Alois_P._Heinz) \*)

PROG

(PARI) {a(n) = local(A, A1, an, i, t); if( n<2, n>=0, an = Vec(A = A1 = 1 + O('x^n)); for(m=2, n, i=m\\2; an\[m\] = sum(k=1, i, an\[k\] \* an\[m-k\]) + (t = polcoeff( if( m%2, A \*= (A1 - 'x^i)^-an\[i\], A), m-1))); t + if( n%2==0, binomial( -polcoeff(A, i-1), 2)))}; /\* [Michael Somos](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Michael_Somos) \*/

(PARI)

N=66; A=vector(N+1, j, 1);

for (n=1, N, A\[n+1\] = 1/n \* sum(k=1, n, sumdiv(k, d, d \* A\[d\]) \* A\[n-k+1\] ) );

[A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") =concat(\[0\], A);

H(t)=subst(Ser([A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point)."), 't), 't, t);

x='x+O('x^N);

Vec( 1 + H(x) - 1/2\*( H(x)^2 - H(x^2) ) )

\\\\ [Joerg Arndt](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Joerg_Arndt), Jul 10 2014

(Magma)

N:= 30; P<x>:= PowerSeriesRing(Rationals(), N+1); f:= func< A | x\*&\*\[Exp(Evaluate(A, x^k)/k): k in \[1..N\]\]>; G:= x; for i in \[1..N\] do G:= f(G); end for; G000081:= G; G000055:= 1 + G - G^2/2 + Evaluate(G, x^2)/2; [A000055](https://oeis.org/A000055 "Number of trees with n unlabeled nodes."):= Eltseq(G000055); // Geoff Baileu (geoff(AT)maths.usyd.edu.au), Nov 30 2009

(SageMath)

\[len(list(graphs.trees(n))) for n in range(16)\] # [Peter Luschny](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Peter_Luschny), Mar 01 2020

(Haskell)

import Data.List (generic\_index)

import Math.OEIS (getSequenceByID)

triangle x = (x \* x + x) \`div\` 2

a000055 n = let {r = genericIndex (fromJust (getSequenceByID " [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") ")); (m, nEO) = divMod n 2}

in r n - sum (zipWith (\*) (map r \[0..m\]) (map r \[n, n-1..\]))

\+ (1-nEO) \* (triangle (r m + 1))

\-- [Walt Rorie-Baety](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Walt_Rorie-Baety), Jun 12 2021

(Python)

\# uses function from [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).")

def [A000055](https://oeis.org/A000055 "Number of trees with n unlabeled nodes.") (n): return 1 if n == 0 else [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n)-sum([A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (i)\* [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n-i) for i in range(1, n//2+1)) + (0 if n % 2 else ([A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n//2)+1)\* [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (n//2)//2) # [Chai Wah Wu](https://oeis.org/wiki/User:Chai_Wah_Wu), Feb 03 2022

(refined by diameter), [A238414](https://oeis.org/A238414 "Triangle read by rows: T(n,k) is the number of trees with n vertices having maximum vertex degree k (n>=1, 0<=k<=n-1).") (refined by maximum vertex degree).

Cf. [A000081](https://oeis.org/A000081 "Number of unlabeled rooted trees with n nodes (or connected functions with a fixed point).") (rooted trees), [A000272](https://oeis.org/A000272 "Number of trees on n labeled nodes: n^(n-2) with a(0)=1.") (labeled trees), [A000169](https://oeis.org/A000169 "Number of labeled rooted trees with n nodes: n^(n-1).") (labeled rooted trees), [A212809](https://oeis.org/A212809 "Decimal expansion of radius of convergence of g.f. for unlabeled trees (A000055).") (radius of convergence).

Cf.
